heal.name: Hikari Amano
heal.text: Quiet Encouragement — When an ally gains {BOND}, heal them 1 Affection. Heal 1 — Restore 3 Affection to any ally. Cleanse 1 — Remove one debuff or Curse from an ally.
heal.flavor: You don’t have to fight alone anymore…

heal.name: Mina Hanekawa
heal.text: Infectious Cheer — At the start of your turn, all allies gain +1 BP until end of turn. Boost 2 — Increase an ally’s attack by +3 this turn. Heal 2 — Restore 2 Affection to all allies.
heal.flavor: Nyaa~ Let’s give it our all together!

cleanse.name: Hikari Amano
cleanse.text: Quiet Encouragement — When an ally gains {BOND}, heal them 1 Affection. Heal 1 — Restore 3 Affection to any ally. Cleanse 1 — Remove one debuff or Curse from an ally.
cleanse.flavor: You don’t have to fight alone anymore…

boost.name: Mina Hanekawa
boost.text: Infectious Cheer — At the start of your turn, all allies gain +1 BP until end of turn. Boost 2 — Increase an ally’s attack by +3 this turn. Heal 2 — Restore 2 Affection to all allies.
boost.flavor: Nyaa~ Let’s give it our all together!

boost.name: Aika Suzuhara
boost.text: Hot-Headed Retort — When attacked, gain +1 Shield until end of turn. Burn 2 — Deal 3 damage over time to a target enemy. Boost 2 — Increase your attack by +2 this turn.
boost.flavor: Don’t get the wrong idea! I just happened to be nearby.

shield.name: Celeste Draconis
shield.text: Royal Command — When played, give one ally +1 {BOND}. Shield 1 — Grant +2 Shield to an ally of your choice. Charm 2 — Command one enemy waifu to defend instead of attack this turn. Pierce 3 — Deal +4 damage that ignores Shield.
shield.flavor: Bow before my majesty, and I may let you stand beside me.

charm.name: Celeste Draconis
charm.text: Royal Command — When played, give one ally +1 {BOND}. Shield 1 — Grant +2 Shield to an ally of your choice. Charm 2 — Command one enemy waifu to defend instead of attack this turn. Pierce 3 — Deal +4 damage that ignores Shield.
charm.flavor: Bow before my majesty, and I may let you stand beside me.

charm.name: Reina Kurogane
charm.text: Love or Death — When an ally falls, gain +1 {BOND} and heal 2 Affection. Drain 2 — Steal 2 Affection from an enemy waifu. Curse 3 — Inflict −2 BP for 2 turns. Charm 3 — Force one enemy waifu to skip their next attack.
charm.flavor: Your heartbeat belongs to me now.

pierce.name: Celeste Draconis
pierce.text: Royal Command — When played, give one ally +1 {BOND}. Shield 1 — Grant +2 Shield to an ally of your choice. Charm 2 — Command one enemy waifu to defend instead of attack this turn. Pierce 3 — Deal +4 damage that ignores Shield.
pierce.flavor: Bow before my majesty, and I may let you stand beside me.

pierce.name: Sayo Yukinaga
pierce.text: Cold Precision — Your first attack each turn ignores 1 Shield. Freeze 2 — Prevent an enemy waifu from acting until your next turn. Pierce 2 — Deal +3 damage ignoring Shield.
pierce.flavor: Calm your mind. Let the cold guide your strike.

freeze.name: Sayo Yukinaga
freeze.text: Cold Precision — Your first attack each turn ignores 1 Shield. Freeze 2 — Prevent an enemy waifu from acting until your next turn. Pierce 2 — Deal +3 damage ignoring Shield.
freeze.flavor: Calm your mind. Let the cold guide your strike.

burn.name: Aika Suzuhara
burn.text: Hot-Headed Retort — When attacked, gain +1 Shield until end of turn. Burn 2 — Deal 3 damage over time to a target enemy. Boost 2 — Increase your attack by +2 this turn.
burn.flavor: Don’t get the wrong idea! I just happened to be nearby.

drain.name: Reina Kurogane
drain.text: Love or Death — When an ally falls, gain +1 {BOND} and heal 2 Affection. Drain 2 — Steal 2 Affection from an enemy waifu. Curse 3 — Inflict −2 BP for 2 turns. Charm 3 — Force one enemy waifu to skip their next attack.
drain.flavor: Your heartbeat belongs to me now.

curse.name: Reina Kurogane
curse.text: Love or Death — When an ally falls, gain +1 {BOND} and heal 2 Affection. Drain 2 — Steal 2 Affection from an enemy waifu. Curse 3 — Inflict −2 BP for 2 turns. Charm 3 — Force one enemy waifu to skip their next attack.
curse.flavor: Your heartbeat belongs to me now.

bond.name: Bond Promise
bond.text: Choose a waifu. Gain +2 Bonds on that waifu. If that waifu is in Dere or higher, draw a card.

ramp.name: Bond Promise
ramp.text: Choose a waifu. Gain +2 Bonds on that waifu. If that waifu is in Dere or higher, draw a card.

defense.name: Reversal Strike
defense.text: Trap Trigger: When an opponent declares an attack, prevent 2 damage and deal 1 damage to the attacker. If your defending waifu is Extreme, deal 2 instead.
defense.flavor: Tension flips momentum faster than you can say 'baka'.

burst.name: Reversal Strike
burst.text: Trap Trigger: When an opponent declares an attack, prevent 2 damage and deal 1 damage to the attacker. If your defending waifu is Extreme, deal 2 instead.
burst.flavor: Tension flips momentum faster than you can say 'baka'.
